Name: Blush
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Cranberry puree
History: Belarus Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Lizaveta Molyavka, New Project, Minsk
Nutrition: One serving of Blush contains 140 calories
